TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_sumamadan, title = sumamadan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/sumamadan} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:古時候) manamuh kaku a mitengil tu nu sumamad a kungku. .
(kamo no holam:古時候) manamoh kako a mitengil to no somamad a kongko. .
